synopsis.text: Fuchigamori, a quaint town nestled in the mountains, is home to a unique blend of humans, youkai, and gods, living harmoniously in a serene environment. One summer, Buchio, a 20-year-old cat, undergoes an unexpected transformation into a nekomata, sparking curiosity about the cause of his sudden evolution. Alongside Yuri, a transforming kitsune, Buchio embarks on a journey to unravel the mystery behind his new form. Meanwhile, Muu-chan, intrigued by the enigmatic crow Tengu Jirou, discovers hidden depths to him as he carries out his duties. Amidst these events, whispers of an unfortunate Nue begin to circulate, hinting at a darker presence lurking in the peaceful town. Engamori, where the supernatural is the norm, invites you to delve into its charming atmosphere and uncover the enigmatic connections between its inhabitants.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
